      • setDisposable

        BalloonBuilder setDisposable(Disposable anchor)
        Links target balloon life cycle to the given object. I.e. current balloon will be auto-hide and collected as soon as given anchor is disposed.

        Note: given disposable anchor is assumed to correctly implement #hashCode() and #equals(Object).

        Parameters:
        anchor - target anchor to link to
        Returns:
        balloon builder which produces balloon linked to the given object life cycle

      • createBalloon

        Balloon createBalloon()
